sub_title: Detailed Marketing Person who specializes in tech companies/ 20+ Yrs experience in Tradeshows / User Events
summary:
• 20 years experience in the marketing / meeting planning / exhibit management industry.
• Dependable, detail oriented, solution driven, fiscally responsibly, creative and composed under pressure.
• Certified Meeting Professional (CMP) designation February 2003 – 2008. 
• Users Conference experience for tech companies (up to 1500 attendees).
• Planned participation in more than 250 domestic and international conferences, meetings & tradeshows ranging from 20 attendees up to 25,000 attendees. 
• Strong experience in corporate and international events including working with executive staff.
• Ability to handle many concurrent projects at various stages.

profile_positions.description:
-Managed all social media accounts, company website and marketing budget.
-Wrote and disseminated press releases for national distribution.
-Managed creative agency staff and creative process of new branding, collateral, marketing materials, website creation, blog articles and content creation.
-Created and managed execution of editorial and social media content calendars.
-Created and executed targeted social media ads (Facebook, Twitter & LinkedIn, Instagram, Google Ads) and distributed digital newsletters (Using Mailchimp.)
-Ran successful marketing campaigns, including a pre-sale campaign.
profile_positions.title: VP, Marketing

profile_positions.description:
-Managed multiple client accounts focusing on branding, website project management, social media management, PR, conference & tradeshow promotions/ booths. 
-Account management and project management with a wide variety of clients.
-Took leadership of projects, interacted with clients, lead meetings and completed projects on time and on budget.
-Managed creative process of new collateral, marketing materials, exhibit properties, website creation, blog articles and content creation.
-Created, and managed execution of editorial and social media content calendars.
-Created and executed targeted social media ads (Facebook, Twitter & LinkedIn) and distributed digital newsletters.
-Managed clients’ websites, blogs, and more than 30 concurrent social media accounts.

Coolfire Solutions, LLC - St. Louis, MO (2011 & 2012)

-Assisted with coordination and logistics of product launch event.

Automatic Data Processing Inc. (ADP) - Alpharetta, GA (2008 - 2011)

-Assisted with coordination of annual client users conference including speaker management, session room scheduling, audio visual requests, agenda, logistics.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Events Consultant

profile_positions.description:
•	Managed annual client event named Meeting of the Minds (1200 attendees) – Included location/ venue selection, budgeting, registration site management, educational sessions management, hotel logistics / room block management, vendor management, speaker management, exhibit management, room sets, audio visual requirements, agenda creation, event promotions and communications (internal and externally), food and beverage selection, and coordination of optional activities and tours.
•	Increased client attendance and attendee satisfaction of Meeting of the Minds three years in a row (receiving an overall satisfaction evaluation of above 95%)
•	Developed Exhibitor / Sponsorship / Partner prospectus and managed business partner participation.
•	Served as main point of contact for Meeting of the Minds Client Advisory Board – conducted weekly conference calls.
•	Managed annual National Account Services Sales Rally Event (600 attendees) – Included overall program and vendor management, registration site creation, airline booking management, hotel room block management, VIP management, production / video production management, and transportation for all attendees. 
•Coordinated National Account Services Conference/Trade Show Participation - Researched, proposed and managed participation in outside industry events. Supported division’s participation in national events as well as regional events. 
•Budget & Vendor Management - Managed vendors for event planning and execution. Provided alternatives for keeping production costs within the overall budget. Responsible for tracking spending on projects to stay within the projected plan and managed $1.5M event budget. 
•Special Project Management - Support various projects in a manner consistent with strategic objectives. Coordinated and managed ADP Board meetings, department meetings
•Maintained and manage relationships with outside vendors (Destination Management Companies, exhibit services, promotional material suppliers.)
profile_positions.title: Marketing Events Manager

profile_positions.description:
•Coordinated and managed conferences, special events, global incentive trips, and all event-related logistics for a variety of client accounts.
•Account Executive tasks included:
      Global Site/ venue selection, budgeting, hotel logistics / room block management, speaker management, exhibit management, room sets, audio visual requirements, agenda creation, event promotions and communications, dine arounds, food and beverage selection, coordination of optional activities and tours, and coordination of airline ticketing.

•Managed client’s event budget and expense tracking and ROI.
•Maintained and managed relationships with outside vendors (Destination Management Companies, exhibit services, promotional material suppliers.)
profile_positions.title: Account Executive

profile_positions.description:
Promoted to Manager, Conferences & Events April 2002
•Managed logistics of company participation in 70+ tradeshows/global conferences per year.
•Planned and produced four annual company-hosted innaugural international and domestic events (up to 1500 attendees.) Tasks included:
Site determination, budgeting, program committee management, call for proposals management, speaker management, room sets, audio visual requirements, agenda creation, client promotions and communications, staff preparation and scheduling, food and beverage selection, post-conference analysis and communication.
•Served as on-site manager at large domestic, international, and hosted events.
•Negotiated hotel, travel, and facilities contracts.
•Adhered to tightening budgets and provided cost-saving alternatives.
•Researched new conferences and negotiated sponsorships and participation.
•Managed budgets and tracked expenses.
•Managed relationships with outside vendors (registration company, exhibit services, fulfillment house, printer, labor company.) 
•Improved Call for Proposal process and program content of hosted events.
•Managed post-conference analysis and Return on Investment (ROI) measurement.
•Worked with department directors to determine goals of various conferences.

Marketing Events Specialist
Washington, DC
May 2000 - March 2002

•Managed logistics of company participation in 75+ tradeshows/conferences per year.
•Planned and produced two company hosted events per year (350 - 750 attendees.)
•Managed promotional collateral, premiums and display material for events.
•Tracked expenses for conferences and events.
•Supported sales staff requests for marketing material and support.
•Managed registrations and confirmation letters for hosted events.
•Served as on-site manager at large conferences and company hosted events.
•Managed conference content for newsletters and client communications.
